thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 18 of 189
thread.title: Audrey Hughes

author: Audrey Hughes
title: Audrey Hughes
text: This site has been extremely helpful in finding qualified candidates. Within minutes, we had many; within hours we had over 100 qualified candidates. The site was very easy to use and navigate. The ability to rate the candidate made it easy to filter and revisit the applicants and stay focused on the ones you would like to follow up with. Our company will be using ZipRecruiter from now on when we are looking for a qualified applicants.
